name: 8Boom
description:
A Doom-inspired shooter created for the 8x8 jam!

This is a demo/prototype. I'd love to continue working on this project after the jam!

Credits:

Music made with CGMusic: http://maciej.codeminion.com/2008/05/cgmusic-computers-create-music/

8Bit effect created using GXSCC.

Sound effects were made with BFXR: https://www.bfxr.net/
